Articles.Content: I need help finding the mod these parts go to:kerbpro and mk1podrasterdemo thanks

1. Welcome to the forums!

2. Please don't make duplicate threads. Also, it'd be very useful if you gave your threads explanatory titles, like "Help finding mods using two parts" rather than "Help!"

3. The second sounds like it's from RPM. Dunno where the first is from.

kerbpro is from HullCameraVDS, the other one is not in my knowledge base (yet).

The "knowledge base" btw is part of a new site for craft sharing I'm working on, that also mines info about what mods and parts exist. Unfortunately today was the day I reset the knowledge base after its initial trail run, so currently it only knows about 80 mods and some 1800+ parts. But those figures will grow pretty quickly if the initial trail run is any indicator.

If you go to http://KerbalX.com/parts then you can search for parts and find out which mod they belong to (and what craft use those parts).
sorry i thought the other one didnt post
